abstract: As the Bancroft family assembles to consider selling Dow Jones & Company, money will not be the only issue on the table.
snippet: As the Bancroft family assembles to consider selling Dow Jones & Company, money will not be the only issue on the table.
lead_paragraph: As it assembles at the Boston Hilton today to consider selling Dow Jones & Company and its main prize, The Wall Street Journal, to Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation, the controlling Bancroft clan faces some stark choices.

headline.main: A Family Meets Today to Hear the Complexities of a Bid for Dow Jones
headline.print_headline: A Family Meets Today to Hear the Complexities of a Bid for Dow Jones

abstract: If Rupert Murdoch acquires Dow Jones, there are no guarantees of editorial independence at Barron’s, a prestigious  financial and investment newspaper.
snippet: If Rupert Murdoch acquires Dow Jones, there are no guarantees of editorial independence at Barron’s, a prestigious  financial and investment newspaper.
lead_paragraph: While the bulk of speculation, anticipation and hand-wringing over Rupert Murdoch’s potential purchase of Dow Jones has focused on The Wall Street Journal, a smaller media property has quietly chugged along, successful and unprotected.

headline.main: Barron’s, With Less Insulation, May Nicely Survive Murdoch
headline.print_headline: Barron’s, With Less Insulation, May Nicely Survive Murdoch

abstract: As it assembles at the Boston Hilton on Monday to consider selling Dow Jones & Company and its main prize, The Wall Street Journal, to Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation, the controlling Bancroft clan faces some stark choices.
lead_paragraph: As it assembles at the Boston Hilton on Monday to consider selling Dow Jones & Company and its main prize, The Wall Street Journal, to Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation, the controlling Bancroft clan faces some stark choices.

headline.main: Bancrofts Meet to Consider Dow Jones Sale
